name: Warrior Rush
description:
This game is made in 1 week as a YouTube challenge with the Godot Game Engine.

In this game you attack enemies and avoid their attacks making your way to the final boss.

This game has:

- Pixel art graphics.

- Retro-style Music by sawsquarenoise and Defrini.

- Controller support.

 - 3 stages where you get a power up of the damage and of the attack everytime you complete one.

- Lots of new enemies and bosses every stage.

- Avoid and Attack combat system.

Controls:

W, Left stick up - Avoid up.

S, Left stick down  - Avoid down.

Space, R2 - Attack.

P, B - Pause.

Q, A- Exit Pause.

M - Mute.

N - Unmute.

Enter - Start.

R, Start - Restart.
